title: 推荐一个高雅英文推特账号：习近平在看东西@zaikandongxi。
contents:
https://twitter.com/zaikandongxi

Dedicated to Chairman Xi and learning Chinese 


一路看下来对里面的内容泽泽称赞，所以决定吃饱了没事干帮他再说一遍！

稍有常识的人都会看出，这位推主是一个全心全意的包蜜，全方位无死角跟进习主席的每一个脚步，第一时间转发习主席看过的每一个物件，做出的每一个维小的动作。所以他膜包无罪！

他的洋文水平也好得很（好像是匈牙利人，但是英文和中文几乎母语级别），这是坠好的。每篇推文都高雅至极，can't recommend more. 我随手给大家搬运一些坠新的推文。需要翻译的话留言即可，到那时候我会表态的~裆燃也墙裂推荐各位痣我奋斗，还是按照英文的（双蛤蟆爪下劈）……按照文法（下劈x2）、按照词性（左蛤蟆前腿不标准纳粹礼）——去产生（翻译）。

In their fight for democracy, a few Hong Kong protesters have lost an eye, but Mr. Xi still has both so he could look at Greek sculptures, many of which are missing a limb or two. "These Greek ideals of the past don't seem to come without bodily harm..." Athens, Nov. 12th, 2019.


When you visit the China Aviation Museum, but it's also a museum of you. Xi Jinping in the foreground, Xi Jinping in the background—another case of "Double Xi" (双习), Beijing, Nov. 8th, 2019.





Un-blockchain my heart!
Chairman, let me go!
Un-blockchain my heart!
Cause you don't love me no more.
Ev'ry time I call you on the phone,
Some comrade tells me that you're not at home.
Un-blockhain my heart, set me free!

-- Karaoke lamentation of a party member



Bonjour les amis! Madame Xi & Madame Macron looking at le marzipan (扁桃仁膏). Quel pity it's too petite to regarde, zoom in s'il vous plaît! Shanghai, Nov. 5, 2019.

Xinhua doesn't name it, but it looks like marzipan, if not then I'll have to book a rendez-vous with my optician.



个人坠爱：


The classic tweet that was deleted by Global Times. It appears to have been scrubbed from their website as well. Perhaps, Mr. Xi has lost competence since then.
